body:
https://gyazo.com/b8e72118f888603f137d4b8307b56fd4
Why can't I reserve at 2am? Why is the next one at 4am?
Is anyone else getting this?

title: Scrim server reservation

replies.body: Maybe the time already passed? Or do you mean something different? O.o
replies.body_tagged: Maybe the time already passed? Or do you mean something different? O.o

replies.body:
If you look at my clock, it was 1.43am
I should have been able to reserve a server at 2am
But I had no option to, instead the next server I could reserve was at 4am

replies.body: For me in the UK the scrim server clock is an hour ahead.
replies.body_tagged: For me in the UK the scrim server clock is an hour ahead.
